documents.document: We spend all that money on proven championship players but gamble on a goalkeeper?! Not the only person at fault, but it's not helping.#avfc
Stupidity from Grealish, negativity from Bruce and the same old late collapse after playing some decent football. Elphick still shaky. #AVFC
What is going on at the Liberty Stadium?!
@virginmedia but we are now 7/8 months after the phone launch. Frustrating as it makes one of the key benefits of your service useless.
@virginmedia it is ridiculous that the flagship Samsung phones don't work with your services though? Is there even a fix being looked at?
@virginmedia why does my S7 edge not work with TV Anywhere?!
